Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres above two white bands; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of chequers with dotted blanks at rim above broken maeander band between lines; reserved below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0994) (phase 2)
